item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, March 29, 2024 at 5:50 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Sam Bankman-Fried’s fate is sealed by his own words
2. Netflix adaptation of sci-fi novel ‘The Three-Body Problem’ sparks anger in China
3. FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried sentenced to 25 years in prison for fraud
4. Fed chair Powell expects US inflation to keep cooling in coming months
5. Israeli court deals blow to Netanyahu in ruling on religious students
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, March 29, 2024 at 5:50 PM UTC
